name: Among The Clouds
description:
Among The Clouds is a classic endless runner game with a unique twist - the ability to shift gravity!
Jump over falls and hazards, collect coins, shift gravity and run upside-down when there is no ground under your feet! Don't fly to space though - it hurts!
Challenge yourself with three game modes - easy, normal, and hard - and beat your best score! 


CONTROLS:

Windows : [SPACE] to jump, [ESC] to pause

Android: Touch the screen to jump, press the special button to pause
